Built to detect the way humans do.

Segmento Sense's multi-pass system utilizes both pattern matching and AI models for unmatched accuracy and reliability.

Traditional pattern matching

Segmento Sense first uses advanced pattern recognition to identify potential PII across all data sources.

→

AI classification and context

Machine learning models analyze context, classify sensitivity levels, and understand relationships between data elements.

→

Human-level verification

Like a human reviewer, our system validates and corrects edge cases, ensuring accuracy even in complex scenarios.

All-in-one PII intelligence.

Segmento Sense's comprehensive feature set covers the long tail of your data protection needs, out of the box.

PII Pattern Recognition

Advanced algorithms detect SSNs, credit cards, emails, phone numbers, and custom PII patterns.

Multi-Source Scanning

Scan databases, cloud storage, APIs, file systems, and more through one unified platform.

Multilingual Detection

Detect PII across 100+ languages with locale-specific patterns and validation.

REST APIs and webhooks for seamless integration with your existing data stack.
